required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Epidemiological Study in Subjects With Vulvovaginal Candidiases
clinical_study.official_title: Estudio epidemiológico de la evolución clínica y microbiológica en Pacientes Tratadas Por un Episodio Agudo de Candidiasis Vulvovaginal

brief_summary.textblock: Epidemiological study about the clinical and microbiological progress in subjects under treatment for a severe vulvovaginal candidiases episody

primary_outcome.measure: Estimate cure rate in women with severe vuvovaginal candidiases infection
primary_outcome.description: Women must require antimicotic treatment plus vaginal probiotic following the habitual therapeutic standards

secondary_outcome.description: It will be consider recurrences an asymptomatic period for 7-10 days and a negative culture
It will be consider recurrences an asymptomatic period for 7-10 days and a negative culture

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the link between symptomatology and negative culture
Evaluate the effectiveness of probiotic treatment by physician
secondary_outcome.description: A gynecological exploration will be performed

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the effectiveness of probiotic treatment by patient. A satisfaction questionnaire will be performed
secondary_outcome.description: The subject will be asked how long the symptoms lasted and the gravity of them

arm_group.description: Women that are prescribed treatment with clotrimazole: 500 mg. and probiotics (routine clinical practice)

study_pop.textblock: Women with VVC symptomatology and positive culture

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Sexually active women between 18 and 50 years of age at time of screening
- With diagnosis and symptomatology of VVC
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant women
- Diabetes Mellitus
- Women witihin three months after a delivery or misbirth
- Women with vaginal or genital infection symptomatology other than candidiases that needs antibiotic treatment
- Vaginal probiotics use within last three months
- Undiagnosed abnormal genital hemorrhage
